title: Clothing Company Seeking Handcraft Artisans
description: We are an ethical clothing brand looking for skilled artisans who can create hand-embroidered motifs on fabric. We prefer working with rural artisans who have traditional embroidery skills. Looking for long-term partnerships.

title: Need Handloom Weavers for Textile Collection
description: Our sustainable fashion brand is expanding. We need talented handloom weavers from rural areas to create unique textile patterns. Must be skilled in traditional weaving techniques.

title: Hiring Artisan Jewelers for Accessories Line
description: Looking for skilled jewelry makers, especially those working with traditional techniques. We want to create a collection that celebrates rural craftsmanship. Experience with brass and silver preferred.
